entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
